column3: Adventurer! <hex:02080FE905FF06>Ma'am<hex:FF04>Sir<hex:03>! How might I be of service?
Me, <hex:02080FE905FF06>ma'am<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>? I am charged with security of this base, <hex:02080FE905FF06>ma'am<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>!
It has been but a year since I took up this post, but I mean to defend Skull Valley with my life, <hex:02080FE905FF06>ma'am<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>!

Allow me to explain, <hex:02080FE905FF06>ma'am<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>! Skull Valley is an encampment established for the purpose of protecting against Sahagin incursions. Though early contact with the fishbacks resulted in only small-scale skirmishes, they have begun moving against us in greater numbers.
Thus, the facilities here were expanded and reinforced to accommodate a larger Maelstrom presence.

It would be an honor to have you assist in the many duties that must be performed in order to keep Skull Valley─and perforce, Limsa Lominsa─safe from the Sahagin threat, <hex:02080FE905FF06>ma'am<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>!
What kind of place is this?
